column1: The Purple Pig////Be prepared to wait in line! I went on a Saturday ~2pm
column2: and waited for an hour. But the food made it well worth it! The service was great as well. We started out with the meatballs
column3: and the combination between the meat
column5: and garnishes were amazing. Though it was pricey
column6: it felt nice to treat myself with these. I wouldn't come here regularly
